resources.string:
v2.1.11-01
 Second attempt at implementing updated MMS alert processing. This time there is a new setting to disable it and use the old logic. Default will be to use old logic for existing users and new logic for new users. Using the new logic requires an update to the support app.
 
 v2.1.10-04
 Location Fixes:
 Macon County, NC
 
 v2.1.10-03
 Location Fixes:
 Tolland County, CT
 Barry County, MI
 Scott County, MO
 Nash County, NC
 Madison County, OH
 Dallas County, TX
 Botetourt County, VA
 Roanoke County, VA
 
 v2.1.10-02
 Disabled new MMS dispatch alert logic which turns out to not work.
 
 v2.1.10-01
 Processing of MMS dispatch alerts under Android 5 and up no longer requires the assistance of a compatible message app.
 
 Screen control options that serve no purpose under Android 10 have been removed.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Marion County, SC
 Neuces County, TX
 Warren County, VA
